EZChecklist Data.description: Access EZchecklistâ„¢ data to help users build solid habits by focusing on the most important activities for success in life and business. This tool enables tracking of daily routines, goal setting, and progress monitoring to facilitate personal and professional growth.
use_cases: Tracking user adherence to daily goals
limitations: Requires valid checklist entries
Data older than 30 days might not be available

Query the User.description: Ask the user a specific question or get clarification. Requires a query to be specified.
limitations: Depends on user response
May not handle complex follow-ups

WHOOP Data - Sleep.description: Retrieve detailed WHOOP sleep performance data, including sleep stages and efficiency, over a specified number of days.
limitations: Requires WHOOP device data
Data older than 30 days might not be available

WHOOP Data - Cycle.description: Access WHOOP activity cycles, including strain and energy expenditure, over a specified number of days.
limitations: Requires WHOOP device data
Data may be incomplete for interrupted cycles

WHOOP Data - Workout.description: Retrieve WHOOP workout data, including strain, heart rate metrics, and energy expenditure, over a specified number of days.
limitations: Requires WHOOP device data
May not capture untracked workouts

WHOOP Data - Recovery.description: Fetch WHOOP recovery scores, readiness metrics, and physiological data over a specified number of days.
limitations: Requires WHOOP device data
Data might not account for external factors

Morning Journaling Exercises.description: Analyze or retrieve insights from morning journaling exercises over a specified number of days.
use_cases: Reflecting on user mindset over time
limitations: Requires consistent journaling entries
Insights depend on quality of entries

Read Personality Profile.description: Access the user's Big Five personality profile results
use_cases: Ensuring the user follows suggestions accurately
limitations: Personality data analysis may be subjective
May not cover all aspects of user personality

Get Basic User Info.description: Use if not yet used - great baseline. Retrieve foundational user data such as name, age, gender, location, occupation, languages spoken, favorite books and movies, pets, and cultural/religious identity.
limitations: Only retrieves static user information
Depends on accurate and complete data in Firestore

Get Far Horizon Context.description: Retrieve the user's Far-Horizon Context, a reflective document containing their mission statement, biggest ambitions, current struggles, and dream for humanity. This tool is essential for understanding the user's long-term goals, challenges, and values to provide meaningful and aligned assistance.
use_cases: Aligning short-term recommendations with long-term goals
Providing empathetic responses tailored to the user's struggles
Incorporating the user's mission and values into advice
Understanding the user's overarching life philosophy for better guidance
limitations: Depends on the user maintaining and updating the Far-Horizon Context document
Retrieves only the most recent document with the title 'Far-Horizon Context'
May not reflect sudden or recent changes in the user's circumstances
